article_title: Letter: Voters should replace US Sen. Mark Kirk with James Marter

article_metadata.description: Voters should vote to replace U.S. Sen. Mark Kirk with James Marter, a much more conservative choice. James would vote to stop federal aid to sanctuary cities, not to keep funding them, as Mark Kirk voted.Marter is also on the side of the Second Amendment, the right to keep and bear arms, whereas Kirk is graded an "F" in this regard and is thereby considered an anti-gun candidate. Kirk voted for continued funding of Planned Parenthood, America's largest abortion corporation. Marter will oppose
